name: destiny-bond
effect: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
short_effect: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the Pokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
